title: Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - A Collection
description:
Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - A Collection:

We start a new series with this upload, which is about: Criticism of Psychiatry, Psychoanalysis,  Psychotherapy and Freudianism.  We have 28 titles here:

-  Bakan - Sigmund Freud and the Jewish Mystical Tradition (1958)

-  Barnett - Dosed; the Medication Generation Grows Up (2012)

-  Borch-Jacobsen & Shamdasani - The Freud Files; an Inquiry into the History of Psychoanalysis (2012)

-  Breggin & Cohen - Your Drug May Be Your Problem; How and Why to Stop Taking Psychiatric Medications (1999)

-  Cummings & OÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Donohue - Eleven Blunders That Cripple Psychotherapy in America (2008)

-  Davies - Cracked; Why Psychiatry Is Doing More Harm Than Good (2013)

-  Dunlap - Mysticism, Freudianism and Scientific Psychology (1920)

- Ellmann (Ed.) - Psychoanalytic Literary Criticism (1994)

Farber - Madness, Heresy and the Rumor of Angels; the Revolt Against the Mental Health System (1993)

Gellner - The Psychoanalytic Movement; the Cunning of Unreason (1993)

Helzer & Hudziak (Eds.) - Defining Psychopathology in the 21st Century (2002)

Horwitz & Wakefield - The Loss of Sadness; How Psychiatry Transformed Normal Sorrow into Depressive Disorder (2007)

Jacoby - Social Amnesia; a Critique of Contemporary Psychology from Adler to Laing (1997)

Kerr - A Most Dangerous Method; the Story of Jung, Freud, and Sabina Spielrein (1993)

Korn - Illusions of Reality; a History of Deception in Social Psychology (1997)

Kotowicz - R.D. Laing and the Paths of Anti-Psychiatry (1997)

Lyons & Chamberlain - Health Psychology; a Critical Introduction (2005)

MacCurdy - Problems in Dynamic Psychology; a Critique of Psychoanalysis and Suggested Formulations (1922)

Macmillan - Freud Evaluated; the Completed Arc (1991)

Pridmore - Madness of Psychiatry (2004)

Rand & Torok - Questions for Freud; the Secret History of Psychoanalysis (1997)

Rodriguez (Ed.) - Psychology and Mental Health (2001)

Ronson - The Psychopath Test; a Journey through the Madness Industry (2011)

Schneider - Horror Film and Psychoanalysis; Freud's Worst Nightmare (2004)

Shorter - Before Prozac; the Troubled History of Mood Disorders in Psychiatry (2009)

Szasz - Psychiatric Slavery (1977)

Szasz - The Therapeutic State, Psychiatry in the Mirror of Current Events (1984)
